startServiceResidentialPage.bannerVerbiage: You must be the primary account holder to transfer, terminate, or start service for this account. This form is for residential and commercial accounts only. For new construction or multi-unit sites, please contact us instead at 1-800-555-1213 .
startServiceResidentialPage.streetNameVerbiage: Examples include Preston (for Preston Road), or 13th (for 13th Street)
startServiceResidentialPage.verifyYourAddressVerbiage: Below are the address(es) that are the closest match to the address you entered. If your address is not listed please try again with different search criteria and be more specific about the service address, i.e,add an apartment number, mobile home lot number, suite number, etc.
startServiceResidentialPage.socialSecurityVerbiageStep_2: Please enter the last four digits only.
